Audit Department

Audit Department : bokauditdpt@bok.or.kr

Conducting general and special audits on Bank of Korea businesses and follow-up control on matters indicated by the auditor, Conducting daily audits of accounting and major business documents, Advance review of major financial reports for external submission, Handling all business related to external audits

  • Address : 67, Sejong-daero, Jung-gu, Seoul, 04514, Rep. of KOREA
  • Tel : 82-2-759-5729
  • Fax : 82-2-759-5880
